name: Fraz-Urb'luu
damage_immunities: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing that is nonmagical

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
descriptions: Fraz-Urb'luu's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 23). Fraz-Urb'luu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

descriptions.raw: At will: alter self (can become Medium-sized when changing his appearance), detect magic, dispel magic, phantasamal force
descriptions.hyperlinked: At will: alter self (can become Medium-sized when changing his appearance), detect magic, dispel magic, phantasamal force

descriptions.raw: 3/day each: confusion, dream, mislead, programmed illusion, seeming
descriptions.hyperlinked: 3/day each: confusion, dream, mislead, programmed illusion, seeming

descriptions.raw: 1/day each: mirage arcane, modify memory, project image
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1/day each: mirage arcane, modify memory, project image

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day).
descriptions: If Fraz-Urb'luu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
descriptions: Fraz-Urb'luu has advantage on saving throws against spell and other magic effects.

special_abilities.name: Undetectable.
descriptions: Fraz-Urb'luu can't be targeted by divination magic, perceived through magical scrying sensors, or detected by abilities that sense demons or fiends.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: Fraz-Urb'luu makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his fists.

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fist.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (4d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

legendary_action_description: Fraz-Urb'luu can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creautre's turn. Fraz-Urb'luu regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary_actions.name: Tail.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 31 (4d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is also grappled (escape DC 24). The grappled target is also restrained. Fraz-Urb'luu can grapple only one creature with his tail at a time.

legendary_actions.name: Phantasmal Killer (Costs 2 Actions).
descriptions: Fraz-Urb'luu casts phantasmal killer, no concentration required.
